scripts.dev:all:nix: npm run dev:frontend & npm run dev:backend
scripts.dev:all:win: powershell -Command "Start-Process -NoNewWindow npm -ArgumentList 'run dev:frontend'; Start-Process -NoNewWindow npm -ArgumentList 'run dev:backend'"
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w frontend && echo "(Opcional) Agrega build del backend si lo necesitas"
scripts.lint: npm -w frontend run lint && npm -w backend run lint
